ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) container pineapple-flavored cream cheese (such as Philadelphia®)
½ pound thinly sliced deli ham

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese slightly for easier spreading
Spread ingredients evenly to prevent overflow when rolling
Slice pinwheels with a serrated knife using a gentle sawing motion
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on proper rolling and slicing technique for attractive pinwheels.
